frontmatter.title: marissaangell.github.io
frontmatter.description: The source code for this site! Made using the Gatsby JS framework.

frontmatter.title: Lifestyle App
frontmatter.description: An Android app for tracking health and planning outdoor activities.

frontmatter.title: Mass-Spring Simulator
frontmatter.description: A small WebGL app that performs physically-based simulation using a mass-spring system.

frontmatter.title: NLP Information Extraction
frontmatter.description: Using Natural Language Processing to extract key information from articles.

frontmatter.title: Simple Ray Tracer
frontmatter.description: A small WebGL app that does GPU raytracing in the browser.

frontmatter.title: OBJ Renderer
frontmatter.description: A small WebGL app that renders .obj files using Blinn-Phong shading.

frontmatter.title: Multi-User Spreadsheet (Server & Client)
frontmatter.description: A simplified version of Google Sheets in C++.

frontmatter.title: Provotypes 2019 FRC Robot
frontmatter.description: Robot code for FIRST Robotics Competition's 'Deep Space' season.

frontmatter.title: Interactive Historical Fiction
frontmatter.description: An interactive historical fiction story about the Chernobyl disaster.

frontmatter.description: A perplexing interactive narrative experience created for a New Media writing class.

frontmatter.title: Provo High Legacy Site
frontmatter.description: A photo showcase spanning 60 years made to commemorate the school's legacy.

frontmatter.description: Robot code for FIRST Robotics Competition's 'Power Up' season.
